plot: Ami is in love with her older brother. When their mother catches them making love, he is sent overseas. Thereafter Ami seeks consolation in the caresses of a gigolo... Rie enrols in a strict Catholic girl's boarding school where she catches the eye of Naomi, a popular senior student. Naomi leads the initially reluctant Rie in an ever escalating series of lesbian encounters... Magical girl Caron must overcome her own incompetence to rescue a village princess from sexual enslavement to a demon... Mako is torn between her libidinous inclinations and her modesty. She isn't helped by the appearance of two other selves who push her in both directions. These four arcs along with six stand alone episodes make up Cream Lemon.
ending_theme: "Nukumori Tenderly" (ぬくもりTenderly) by Minami Asaoka (ep 5)
